data.text:
Cinematic Potential of CRE Commercial real estate videos have the power to captivate, inspire, and leave a lasting impression. This is the guiding principle that drives a team of visionaries. For these passionate creatives, each project represents an opportunity to showcase the inherent drama and potential of a space. Deft cinematography highlights the interplay of light and shadow, revealing the architectural details that elevate a property. Seamless transitions immerse viewers, making them feel the very energy and flow of the environment. Every carefully composed shot, every meticulously selected musical cue, works in concert to forge an indelible connection between audience and space. The goal is not just to market a location, but to share its ability to uplift, empower, and transform. This reverence for the built world is the heartbeat behind these productions. It compels the team to pursue videography as a true artistic medium, celebrating the spaces that strengthen our communities and businesses. And it's what makes their work consistently stand out. After all, commercial real estate isn't just about facts and figures. It's about imagining potential, forging connections, and bringing visions to life. Viewed through this lens, these properties become cinematic experiences that inspire. Seeking to capture the true essence of a commercial space on video? 📞 (844) 359-9679 | 🌐 www.creworx.media #CREInsights #CinematicMarketing #CommercialRealEstate #RealEstateInnovation #Marketing

How do you write a set piece that leaves a lasting impression? It's not just where and how the set piece takes place, but also injecting stakes into each of them so we understand what we're rooting for and why. Here are some points to consider: 🔶 Ask yourself: What are the characters trying to achieve? What are the consequences of failure? Establishing high stakes keeps the audience invested. 🔶 Try to build anticipation through clever pacing, dialogue, and visuals. 🔶 Whether it's a mind-blowing stunt or a dazzling display of CGI, a set piece should be visually engaging. 🔶 Ensure the set piece reveals something new about your characters or propels them forward in the story. Click here for more info: https://bit.ly/3VKjhZH #VideoProduction #CreativeVideos #SetPieces #VideoProductionInspo

Greetings, fellow filmmakers and creatives! Allow me to pull back the curtain on the making of “Warda,” my 2021 short film. Brace yourselves: this entire thing was executed with a total of zero dollars. Yes, you read that correctly—not a single cent. It was made during the covid lockdown, my budget was nonexistent, and I didn't have any funding. Now, if you’re curious about what a film conjured from thin air looks like, prepare for an interesting journey. While it has its quirks and imperfections, it remains an intriguing endeavor. Imagine yourself stranded on a desert island, armed with nothing but a rusty spoon and a dash of imagination. That’s the spirit! 🌴🎥 Here’s the crux of the matter: don’t lose sleep over the visuals. Seriously, they’ll fall into place. Instead, channel your inner storyteller. A robust, captivating narrative can carry you through choppy waters. And if, by chance, the final product appears slightly offbeat—fear not. It’s the heart of the story that truly matters AND it won't be your last piece of work anyway. So, my fellow cinematic adventurers, delve into the details of my film. You might just stumble upon your own buried chest of creativity. Enjoy! #filmmaking #storytelling #artdirection #animation #3Dmodeling #3dsmax #rigging #storyboard #story

Metro - Teaser Short Film 🎬 Hello everyone! Here you can see the teaser of the short film Metro in which I participated. We made it as a TFM in the animation master of the UPV. The team is composed by Ferran "Corati" Calle, Andrea Gañan, Luis E. Zerpa Rojas, César Díaz and me (Carles Martí). It is worth mentioning the help we have received from Pablo Sorribes, Sergi Alberca, Iraide Antruejo, Sergi Vives, Malva Malmgren, Ignacio Meneu, Sergio Rodríguez and a large number of graffiti artists whose names you can see in the credits of the short film. The logline is as follows: After missing the last subway of the night, a girl is forced to board a strange and sinister graffitied carriage, where she is trapped with a horrible monster. It was a very enriching experience to work on this project, as it allowed us to learn the whole process of making a 3D animated short film. We dedicated the first year of our master's degree to pre-production and the following two years to production. In the pre-production stage we were in charge of script development, thumbnails, storyboarding, reference research and concept development. In the production stage, although we all collaborated on the various aspects of the short film, each of us focused on a specific role, just as one usually works in a studio. My main responsibility included modeling, lighting and rendering. Working on this project made us realize the importance of teamwork. It is an honor to note that METRO received a special mention at Animac in the 2024 edition. The full short film will be released in a few months, as it is currently being presented at various animation festivals. If you want to see the complete work you can enter my ArtStation: https://lnkd.in/diCdE4Sn I hope you like it! ❤️ --- #digital3d #animation #lighting #character #modeling #render #short #shortfilm #teaser #terror #horror #subway #subwaystation #graphiti #maya #zbrush #arnold #3d

🌟 Unlocking Change: The Power of Animation for Social Impact! 🌍🎨 Ever wondered how to make your message not just heard, but truly felt? 🤔 Enter the world of animation – a game-changer for social change! 🚀 . . . 🎬 Engagement in a Blink: Capture attention instantly! Animation brings your cause to life, turning passive scrollers into active advocates. 💡 💬 Speak Simply, Speak to All: Complex issues, simplified. Animation breaks down barriers, delivering your message in a universal language that resonates across diverse audiences. 🌐 🌈 Borders Fade, Impact Soars: Say goodbye to borders! Animated content transcends geographical constraints, fostering a global community united for change. 🌍 🚀 Shareability Sparks Momentum: Share, share, share! Animation's dynamic nature sparks virality, turning your message into a shared experience with a ripple effect. 🚀 🔥 Imprints that Ignite Action: It's not just a message; it's a lasting impression. Animation inspires action, turning awareness into a catalyst for positive change. 🌟 🤝 Inclusive by Nature: Age, culture, background – animation connects with everyone. Break down demographic walls and foster inclusivity in your cause. 🌈 📈 Algorithms in Your Favor: Animation gets a boost! Social media algorithms love engaging content, amplifying the visibility of your message for maximum impact. 📊 🚀 Ready to make your cause go viral? Dive into the world of animation and watch your message echo across screens, hearts, and borders! 💬✨ #AnimationForChange #SocialImpact #EngageInspireTransform Watch this for reference:
